statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.quantity > 5 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM inventory;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2022-05-31' LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM transactions GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(quantity) > 20
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.product_id = transactions.product_id AND inventory.quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM Products
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers
SELECT customer_name, address, city, country FROM Customers
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date, delivery_status FROM Orders
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM Products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date, delivery_status FROM Orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM Customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, quantity, supplier_name, stock_location FROM Products p JOIN Stock s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 50 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
